ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will remain in it timelessly, for ever. What an excellent lodging and abode!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And abide there for ever: What an excellent destination and abode!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and wherein they will live for ever: what an excellent abode and what an excellent resting place!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will live therein forever, the best abode and place of rest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They shall abide in it forever; what an excellent abode and place of stay.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Abiding therein -- excellent it is as an abode, and as a place to rest in.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Abiding therein; goodly the abode and the resting-place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Therein they shall dwell forever; fair it is as a lodging-place and an abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Abiding there for ever. Happy is it as abode and station!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: There they shall abide forever: a blessed dwelling and a blessed resting place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Abiders therein: excellent it is as an abode and as a station.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: to abide in them [forever], an excellent station and abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Dwelling therein;- how beautiful an abode and place of rest!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Abiding therein; excellent it is as an abode, and as a place to dwell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: There they shall live for ever; a fine dwelling place, and residence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Abiding therein forever—it is an excellent residence and destination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Abiding eternally therein. Good is the settlement and residence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:76] abiding therein. Excellent is it as an abode and station, as a place of residence for them (ūlā’ika, ‘those, they …’, and what comes after it constitute the predicate to the subject ‘ibādu’l-rahmāni, ‘the servants of the Compassionate One’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Abiding there for ever) they will remain in Paradise for ever, neither to die nor leave. (Happy is it as abode) as habitation (and station!) and dwelling!
